mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_data (equipment_id, member_id, date, raw_data, status, sort_order, created_by, created_on, last_update_by, last_update_on) VALUES (#{EquipmentId}, #{memberId}, #{date}, #{rawData}, #{status}, #{sortOrder}, #{createdBy}, #{createdOn}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedOn})
mapper.update: UPDATE member_data SET equipment_id = #{EquipmentId}, member_id = #{memberId}, date = #{date}, raw_data = #{rawData}, status = #{status}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, created_by = #{createdBy}, created_on = #{createdOn}, last_update_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, last_update_on = #{lastModifiedOn} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, equipment_id, member_id, date, raw_data, status, sort_order, created_by, created_on, last_update_by, last_update_on FROM member_data WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, equipment_id, member_id, date, raw_data, status, sort_order, created_by, created_on, last_update_by, last_update_on FROM member_data
